alert.note: Alert for Madison; Morehouse; Richland; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 11:51PM CDT until April 01 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MOREHOUSE...NORTHWESTERN MADISON...RICHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 1151 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Start, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Rayville around 1155 PM CDT. Holly Ridge around 1205 AM CDT. Delhi and Warden around 1215 AM CDT. Waverly around 1220 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Oak Ridge and Epps. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
